name: FillTheContainer
tag_list: collective-factory-ordering, discount-shopping, value-buying, costco-alternative, factory-direct-purchasing, retail-2-0, new-model-for-retail
overview:
FillTheContainer.com enables everyday consumers and small businesses to realize huge savings by buying collectively from the actual factories that make the products.

Factories typically only sell their products in very high quantities, usually in sea-shipping-container-loads. Buying from them has traditionally been the domain of large companies with large buying power, giving them sole access to products at their actual production prices.

FillTheContainer.com levels the playing field, enabling anyone to buy from the same factories as the big guys. That means anyone can buy at actual production prices, up to 80% lower than retail.
